definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: Data compression has been a technique of indispensability in times of information.
sentences.chinese: 数据压缩已经成为信息时代必不可少的一项技术。

sentences.english: SDT(Swinging Door Trending)algorithm with low computation cost is generally used in process data compression.
sentences.chinese: 算法运算量小，在过程数据压缩中得到广泛应用。

sentences.english: Data-compression technology gives convenience to the management and transmission of the resource.
sentences.chinese: 数据压缩技术也使得资源管理和传输更加简便快捷。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the compression algorithm of dynamic length-limited code.
sentences.chinese: 对数据压缩中的动态限长编码压缩算法进行了分析。

sentences.english: The application to data compression is less intuitive.
sentences.chinese: 关于数据压缩的应用缺乏直观性的。

sentences.english: Data compression is a key problem in the applications of hyperspectral images.
sentences.chinese: 数据压缩是高光谱图像处理应用中的一个关键问题。

sentences.english: When used without compression only the lower 16bit of the 32 bit word is used.
sentences.chinese: 无数据压缩仅在低于32位字宽中的确良6位使用。

sentences.english: A new method is proposed for multispectral image data compression.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种三维多光谱图像数据压缩的新方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, we describe a data compression method based on wavelet transform for spectral information.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍一种基于子波变换的光谱信息数据压缩方法。

definition: to address/to search for address/to input data into memory
